node.name: g-Eclipse
node.shortdescription: g-Eclipse is a framework that allows users and developers to access Computing Grids and Cloud Computing resources in a unified way. The framework itself is independent from a certain Grid middleware or Cloud Computing provider. The g-Eclipse project maintains a set of connectors to Grid middlewares, such as g-Lite and GRIA, and provides an adapter to the Amazon webservices EC2 and S3.
node.body: g-Eclipse is a framework that allows users and developers to access Computing Grids and Cloud Computing resources in a unified way. The framework itself is independent from a certain Grid middleware or Cloud Computing provider. The g-Eclipse project maintains a set of connectors to Grid middlewares, such as g-Lite and GRIA, and provides an adapter to the Amazon webservices EC2 and S3.
